revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Axesstel |model=MV430 |revision=i |asin=B004QZOQ1O |fcc_date=08/28/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=3G gateway |fcc_id=PH7MV430A |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Micrel |cpu1_model=KSZ8695PI |cpu2_brand=Qualcomm |cpu2_model=MSM6800A |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV320AB-70TIP |fla2_brand=Hynix |fla2_model=HYC0SEH0A-F3P-5S60E |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S32800B-7TLI |ram2_brand=Hynix |ram2_model=HYC0SEH0A-F3P-5S60E |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;Î¼PD720102GC;NEC CHINA, D720102GC, 0926MBA09;1;,,, 750mA Low-Dropout Linear Voltage Regulator;Micrel;MIC3775;3775 YMM;1;,,, 750mA Low-Dropout Linear Voltage Regulator;Texas Instruments;TPS77733;;2;,,, CDMA2000 1X and 1xEV-DO Receiver;Qualcomm;RFR6500;;1;,,, CDMA2000 1X and 1xEV-DO Transmitter;Qualcomm;RTF6150;;1;,,, 8.4V Low Dropout Linear 2-cell Li-Ion Charge Controller;Texas Instruments;BQ2057W;;1;,,, 2.5V Dual P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDW2506P;;2;,,, |flags=3G (CDMA) |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:19:ED }} '''3G / CDMA2000 Wireless Broadband Gateway'''
"MV440 MV3.1", "06. 26. 2008.", and "7020MV440311" :is silkscreened on the top and bottom of the board. Appears to be same board as [[Axesstel MV440|MV440]] without miniPCI populated.
*[http://www.3g.co.uk/PR/December06/4013.htm ''Availability of 3G Gateways'' on '''3g.co.uk'''] The Axesstel MV400 3G gateways series, including the models: :MV410 (450MHz), MV420 (800MHz), MV430 (1900MHz) and MV440 (800/1900MHz), :combines CDMA2000 1x EV-DO Rev A wireless wide area networking (WWAN), a :Wi-Fi wireless local area networking (WLAN) router, and a four port Ethernet switch.
Additional features of the Axesstel MV400 series 3G gateways include: *Compatibility with other LAN and WLAN networking devices to further expand device networking capability *Two Wi-Fi antennas and two receive diversity antennas to maximize data throughput and network accessibility *An optional back-up battery enables wire-free use in any room and ensures uninterrupted data connectivity *Six LEDs indicate power, signal, connection, 1x EV-DO mode, Ethernet and Wi-Fi status
